info.name: PingOne Platform API
info.description:
This PingOne collection contains only the requests without documentation. For the official PingOne Platform API documentation, see [apidocs.pingidentity.com](https://apidocs.pingidentity.com/pingone/platform/v1/api/).

PingOne Platform API collections use [Postman Collection-Level Authorization](https://apidocs.pingidentity.com/pingone/main/v1/api/#postman-collection-level-authorization) of type `bearer`. All requests that use bearer token authorization are set to `Inherit authorization from parent`.
(2024-04-10 15:53)

    ],
    "tokenEndpointAuthMethod": "CLIENT_SECRET_BASIC",

    "refreshTokenDuration": 86400,

}
